title: Can't send emails, spam message
content: Hi, all of a sudden my outgoing emails are met with the following message: ending of the message failed. An error occurred while sending mail. The mail server responded: Message rejected as spam (CM).. Please check the message and try again. These are to correspondents I regularly send emails to, and I could email them as recently as last night. Is this a firewall issue or a server issue? Please help. Karen
creator: kspeech

title: Connecting to a website can be a problem
content: It's difficult to access a particular webpage on the internet. I get a blank page when I click on this link: https://www.bestmobilelocksmiths.com/ It is a popular mobile locksmith in Cincinnati, Ohio. The website is up and running because I can connect to it using another PC at home. How do I check what messages are sent from my Firefox browser to the website? And then - what is received at my browser from the website? By the way, I have cleared the cache and restarted FF, but I still cannot connect to it. There are other websites that I need help with displaying and interacting properly. How do I know this? - Well - I tried the 3 other websites from other PCs within my home network, and these websites work properly
creator: quianacrcl

title: Medicare pdf document download via Firefox is not legible.
content:
Hello,

Firefox is my default browser. I downloaded a Medicare form and the document was not legible (letters, numbers, odd symbols, etc.). The Medicare chat rep suggested I try another browser. I opened Safari and downloaded the same form and it was legible. What should I do to enable Firefox to produce legible downloads of Medicare forms?

Thanks
creator: edcmerrell

title: "auto" "light" "dark" modes don't work for me. auto and light are too bright. dark unacceptable. how can I change it?
content: what can I do to avoid using the "auto" "light" "dark" modes. They don't work for me.
creator: rebeccaallen899

title: Custom Homepage Site Icons are slow to load
content:
I recently replaced most of my Firefox Homepage Site Icons with custom icons. (No easy task... loking at you Mozilla)...Â :)

Now that I have them replaced, whenever I start Firefox the custom site icons take a long time to load.

The previous default site icons appeared to be cached and I was hoping I could force my custom site icons to cache locally to improve loading times.
creator: mliving

title: SketchUp software 2017 will not connect cannot login to internet
content: Like to get solution to why this software cannot connect to internet and allow me to login. Have had this free software since 2014 and never had this problem before. Any suggestions would be appreciated. Thanks Dave Seigworth
creator: dave.seig

title: Right Click Menu in Bookmarks is not on top when using it in full screen mode (MacOS - 13.1)
content: When I right click in a bookmark menu while in full screen mode in MacOS 13.1 the menu appears below all open fly out menus.
creator: mliving
